definition: an activity that varies from a norm or standard
details:
noun
- an activity that varies from a norm or standard
= synonyms: variation
- an official dispensation to act contrary to a rule or regulation (typically a building regulation)
= example: an official dispensation to act contrary to a rule or regulation (typically a building regulation)
- the quality of being subject to variation
= synonyms: variableness, variability
- a difference between conflicting facts or claims or opinions
= synonyms: divergence, discrepancy, disagreement
- the second moment around the mean
- discord that splits a group
= synonyms: division
- an event that departs from expectations
= synonyms: variant, discrepancy
